Container.Name: PornVault
Container.Overview: ðŸ’‹ Manage your ever-growing porn collection. Using Vue & GraphQL

Config.Name: WebUI port
Config.Description: The port for the porn-vault webinterface

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: Directory for persistent files (config file, database, backups...)

Config.Name: Images import directory
Config.Description: Images stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Images'

Config.Name: Videos import directory
Config.Description: Videos stored here will be shown in the WebUI under 'Scenes'

Config.Name: Uploaded images directory
Config.Description: Images added through the WebUI are stored here. By default this is inside the config directory
